title: Woman's Skirt Length
description:
woman\'s skirt length, cotton, indigo dye, African XXc (63-1/2 x 39-1/2\') *another box of textiles in T22, Bin 2 up lists 85.125.11; one might be .13
Name of Cloth: Serede Sarkoudiou-a cloth with a line that goes straight ahead.  Usually worn by old women.
